fields.name: Anti-Flying-Weakness Temporary Skill
fields.description: A temporary skill that nullifies weapons that deal effective damage against fliers

fields.name: Anti-Cavalry-Weakness Temporary Skill
fields.description: A temporary skill that nullifies weapons that deal effective damage against cavalry

fields.name: Anti-Armored-Weakness Temporary Skill
fields.description: A temporary skill that nullifies weapons that deal effective damage against armored units

fields.name: Anti-Dragon-Weakness Temporary Skill
fields.description: A temporary skill that nullifies weapons that deal effective damage against wyverns

fields.name: Anti-Wyvern-Weakness Temporary Skill
fields.description: A temporary skill that nullifies weapons that deal effective damage against wyverns

fields.name: Flying Effectiveness
fields.description: Deals bonus damage against flying units

fields.name: Cavalry Effectiveness
fields.description: Deals bonus damage against cavalry units

fields.name: Armored Effectiveness
fields.description: Deals bonus damage against armored units

fields.name: Dragon Effectiveness
fields.description: Deals bonus damage against dragons

fields.name: Wyvern Effectiveness
fields.description: Deals bonus damage against wyvern units

fields.name: Brave
fields.description: This weapon attacks twice, every time it would attack normally

fields.name: Dance
fields.description: Allows a single other unit to move again in a skirmish

fields.name: Poisoned
fields.description: Unit takes a bit of damage at the beginning of each turn

fields.name: Poisonous
fields.description: Inflicts the Poisoned status on hit

fields.name: Delphi Shield
fields.description: Negates bonus damage against fliers, if the unit is one

fields.name: Iron Rune
fields.description: Prevents the unit from receiving critical hits

fields.name: Swordslayer
fields.description: Deals bonus damage against sword-wielding units

fields.name: Dark Druid Effectiveness
fields.description: Deals bonus damage against Dark Druids

fields.name: Reverse Weapon Triangle
fields.description: Reverses the effects of the weapon triangle on combat, for both sides

fields.name: Myrms Only
fields.description: Weapon is only equippable by Myrmidons

fields.name: Light Brand
fields.description: Uses half-Str Res-based Light attack when used from more than 1-range

fields.name: Wind Edge
fields.description: Uses half-Str Res-based Anima/Wind attack when used from more than 1-range

fields.name: Runesword
fields.description: Uses half-Str Res-based Light attack when used from more than 1-range

fields.name: Devil Axe
fields.description: Has a (31 - Luk)% chance to backfire

fields.name: Silencer
fields.description: If the unit crits, has a 50% chance to kill the enemy

fields.name: Steal
fields.description: If unit's Spd exceeds opponent's, steal an item from their inventory

fields.name: Play
fields.description: Allows a single other unit to move again in a skirmish

fields.name: Siege Weapon
fields.description: An attack from a distance that can't be countered - but the user can't counter either

fields.name: Crit+15
fields.description: Grants Crit +15

fields.name: Str+5
fields.description: Grants Str + 5

fields.name: Def+5
fields.description: Grants Def + 5

fields.name: Res+5
fields.description: Grants Res + 5

fields.name: Luk+5
fields.description: Grants Luck + 5

fields.name: Uber Spear
fields.description: Grants Max HP +17, Str +5, Skl +4, Spd +9, Def +4, Res +14

fields.name: Afa's Drops
fields.description: Grants +5% to all of the user's growths

fields.name: Nosferatu
fields.description: Restores health equal to damage dealt

fields.name: Luna
fields.description: Ignores enemy Res

fields.name: Eclipse
fields.description: Fixed damage - deals half of enemy HP, rounded up
